desc: Lost and Found wines was established in 2019 when all the stars aligned to create a wine worth the journey to find. Hidden vineyards, off the beaten track, have been selected to grow fruit that tells the tales of the season and the land from which it was grown. From Alexandra in Central Otago, to Waiheke and Wairarapa.

layout.text:
We're bringing you the best wines from the regions you love.
Wine made by friends, for friends.
